main event: A civilian couple observed a brilliant white light in the sky that fell with a slight curve to the west on February 14, 1949.
interesting points: The object was initially stationary before it fell with a slight curve,The light had an orange tinge as it fell,The couple noticed sparks trailing off the object while it was stationary and as it fell,They reported the sighting to the Arizona State Police as an unusual aircraft on fire,This was the first sighting reported by Dr. [Redacted].
sighted object: a brilliant white light with an orange tinge
